content.question: Which of the following examples is beamed correctly?

choices.label: The figure presents two measures of music in treble clef. The key signature has no sharps or flats and the time signature is 6/8.
The figure presents two measures of music in treble clef. The key signature has no sharps or flats and the time signature is 6/8.
The figure presents two measures of music in treble clef. The key signature has no sharps or flats and the time signature is 6/8.
The figure presents two measures of music in treble clef. The key signature has no sharps or flats and the time signature is 6/8.

content.answer: The figure presents two measures of music in treble clef. The key signature has no sharps or flats and the time signature is 6/8.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in notated music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
